title: Spicy Fennel-Meyer Lemon Mignonette
directions: Combine fennel bulb and fronds, chiles, shallot, lemon zest, and lemon juice in a small bowl; season lightly with salt. (Serve alongside oysters.)
ingredients: 1/2 small fennel bulb, finely chopped, plus 1 tablespoon chopped fronds
2 Fresno chiles or jalape√±os, seeded, finely chopped
1 teaspoon finely grated Meyer lemon zest
